name: "Soft Water's Voice"
description: A furnishing that can be found in Merusea Village. It combines a small workbench and a drying rack upon which various items have been hung. A simple stone windchime, shells, and several small dried fish wave in the wind.\nFor some reason, when the windchime hits the shells, the gentle sound of rippling water may be heard â€” a music Melusines consider "the sound of home."
